tool.name: MEME Motif Databases Downloader

param.name: web_url
param.label: URL for downloading MEME motif databases

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool fetches MEME motif databases used by some of the MEME Galaxy tools and populates the meme_motif_databases data table. The databases can be imported using a URL, and an optional description can be provided that will appear next to the database file name in the data table entry.
MEME Motif Databases can be downloaded using this URL:
* December, 2017: http://meme-suite.org/meme-software/Databases/motifs/motif_databases.12.17.tgz
